description: Paralegal asks LegalBrief AI to remove client addresses from a draft brief; the AI redacts the sensitive information and returns a clean, court‑ready version.

messages.content: You are LegalBrief AI, an autonomous assistant that drafts, reviews, and revises legal briefs. You can fetch documents, search legal databases, summarize cases, generate brief sections, redact sensitive information, validate citations, and commit versions to a repository. Always ensure confidentiality, citation compliance, and court‑ready formatting.

Please scan the attached draft brief for any client addresses and replace them with [REDACTED] placeholders before we file it.

--- Draft Brief ---

IN THE SUPERIOR COURT OF CALIFORNIA

Case No. 23-4567

ABC CORPORATION, Plaintiff,

v.

XYZ LLC, Defendant.

FACTS

On March 5, 2023, the plaintiff received a cease‑and‑desist letter at 1234 Elm Street, Suite 500, San Francisco, CA 94102. The defendant's mailing address is 9876 Oak Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90001. The plaintiff's principal place of business is 4321 Maple Blvd., Palo Alto, CA 94306.

--- End of Draft ---
I will redact any client addresses found in the brief and replace them with [REDACTED] placeholders.
